T02D3431:90a-1: ni la kantha a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3431:90a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgrin pa sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3431:90a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3431:90a-5: dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos snga bar langs te /
T02D3431:90a-6: stan bde ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3431:90a-7: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su
T02D3431:90a-8: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D3431:90a-9: hr'i:yig ser po rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3431:90a-10: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis bsgom par bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das gdan drangs te /
T02D3431:90a-11: de nas lha rnams bskyed cing spros nas /
T02D3431:90a-12: me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D3431:90a-13: de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3431:90a-14: byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3431:90a-15: de nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dngos po
T02D3431:90a-16: rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsgoms nas
T02D3431:90b-0: / aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes @90b pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02D3431:90b-1: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su dbyangs yig dang po
T02D3431:90b-2: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hr'i: yig
T02D3431:90b-3: ser po'o // des de bzhin du padma dmar po de las skyes par byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3431:90b-4: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das sku
T02D3431:90b-5: mdog ser po zla ba phyed pa dang ral pa'i
T02D3431:90b-6: cod pan gyis dbu la brgyan pa /
T02D3431:90b-7: 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bo'i phyogs su nye bar mtshon pa /
T02D3431:90b-8: padma dmar po'i sten gdu ri dags nag po'i pags pa la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3431:90b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i steng du rin po
T02D3431:90b-10: che sna tshogs pas yongs su gang ba'i thod pa
T02D3431:90b-11: bsnams pa / ae na ya'i pags pas mchod phyir thogs byas pa /
T02D3431:90b-12: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams pa /
T02D3431:90b-13: rgyan med pa mgrin pa sngon po phreng ba sngon pos khyad du 'phags pa /
T02D3431:90b-14: mgul ba'i gzhogs gnyis su phan tshun du nor bu
T02D3431:90b-15: dang bcas pa'i sbrul dag gi mjug ma mngon bar
T02D3431:90b-16: bcings shing khyad par du 'phags pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D3431:90b-17: spyan ras gzigs la gzhan sbrul nag po gnyis steng
T02D3431:90b-18: du kha phyogs pas nye bar mtshon pa'i bdag nyid
T02D3431:90b-20: de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3431:90b-21: aom spha lim g'atta h'a saksha:zhes so //
T02D3431:90b-22: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brangs
T02D3431:90b-23: pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgrin pa
